Disease.Name: [TREATMENT/THERAPY]: SAPROPTERIN (BH4) [EXTERNAL]
Disease.Gene:
Detail information to gene locus by the National Center for Biotechnology Information NCBI:
MAJOR HISTOCOMPATIBILITY COMPLEX
Disease.Summary: Kuvan (R) is a phenylalanine hydroxylase activator indicated to reduce blood phenylalanine (Phe) leve Is in patients with hyperphenylalaninemia (HPA) due to tetrahydrobiopterin (BH4) responsive Phenylketonuria (PKU). Kuvan contains Mannitol.

literature.title: Introduction of sapropterin dihydrochloride as standard of care in patients with phenylketonuria
literature.author: Vernon HJ,

literature.title: KUVAN (sapropterin dihydrochloride) - SUMMARY OF PRODUCT CHARACTERISTICS
